title: Ian Knott
text: Ian Graham Knott (born 2 October 1976) is an English former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played from 1993 to 2005. He played at club level for <a href="Wigan%20St%20Judes">Wigan St Judes</a> ARLFC, the <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington Wolves</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Warrington%20Wolves%20players">Heritage No. 928</a>), the <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity Wildcats</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Wakefield%20Trinity%20players">Heritage No. 1184</a>), and the <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Leigh%20Centurions%20players">Heritage No. 1219</a>) (<a href="Captain%20%28sports%29">captain</a>), as a , or .
